nodes.text: N-4PO was a protocol droid, that operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

N-4PO lived in the droid colony in the city X2-4 on the moon Uffel, where he worked as the administrator of Uffel Research and Development. In c. 31 BBY, he encountered the Heroes of Cularin when they visited Uffel, and assigned the astromech droid R6-D6 to deal with any queries that they had.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Thaereian military activated defense protocols in some of the droids of Uffel, making them want to fight against organic beings to keep the droids of Uffel safe, and N-4PO became one of the leaders of the rogue droids. Shortlty afterward, encountered the Heroes of Cularin for a second time, when they traveled to Uffel to investigate the Thaereian activities on the moon.
